Name: Column
Trap: If the Primordial ends their involuntary movement on this tile, roll a d10:<<NL>>1-2: Nothing happens.<<NL>>3-8: Place 1 negative @AT token in the Kratos Pool<<NL>>9-10: Place 2 negative @AT tokens in the Kratos Pool

Name: City
Abilities: %Allied% Titans on this tile have +1 @Power. %At War% Treat this tile as an {Obstacle}
Flipped Abilities: %Allied% Titans on this tile have +1 @Power. %At War% Treat this tile as an {Obstacle}

Name: Giant Shell
Treasure: 1: It's still occupied! A siren attacks you, gain +3 @Danger.<<NL>>2-5: A pirate stash. Gain 2 Trireme resources.<<NL>>6-8: Perfect shape. Gain a [Siren Shield|AJ0167] @Gear card.<<NL>>9-10:Ancient shell. Gain 1 Ancient Shell Rare resource

Name: Minos Manos Unit
Trap: If the Primordial ends their involuntary movement on this tile, place 1 negative @AT token in the Kratos Pool
Treasure: 1-3: You try to use the massive machina, but cut yourself on the impossibly sharp circular blade. Gain +2 @Danger and resolve a Trauma Draw.<<NL>>4-7: You tinker with the machina and accidentally turn it on. The hollow boom of its engines draws the Primordial. The Primordial performs Signature against you.<<NL>>8-9: You use the contraption to hone your edge. If you're using a Melee or Reach Weapon, you gain +1 @Power until the end of Battle.<<NL>>10: You break away a functional piece of the Unit and... repurpose it. Gain the [Manos Discus|AJ0280] @Gear card (Secret Deck 2, card 19)!

Name: Maze Outcrop
Treasure: 1: Sensing your presence, the Maze Outcrop burrows deep. Discard this tile. Escalate 1.<<NL>>2-3: You feel an almost existential fear. Gain 1 Despair token.<<NL>>4-7: As if reacting to your presence, the Outcrop expands like a flower! Immediately place 4 [Labyrinth|AI0364] Terrain tiles around the Outcrop. Suffer Knockdown.<<NL>>8-9: Gain 1 Maze Fragment resource.<<NL>>10: You rip open a part of the outer maze formation. Maybe you can use it as a shield? Gain the [Temenos Scale Shield|BJ0829] (Cycle II) @Gear card

Name: Abandoned Temple
Treasure: 1: The realization comes too late - this temple has been claimed by the Labyrinthians! You scramble to the exit, but are tainted nonetheless. Gain the Mazetouched Affliction,<<NL>>2-5: Nature reclaimed the temple and now only birds call it home. You inadvertantly scare them, drawing the Primordial to your position. The Primordial performs Signature against you.<<NL>>6-9: The priest who made this temple his home sees your arrival as a sign and joins you. Gain +1 Priest.<<NL>>10: You cannot believe your eyes. This does not belong in a Dead God's temple... Gain 1 Sisyphus Tear (once per Cycle). If you have already gained a Sisyphus Tear from this Terrain tile, lose -2 @ArgoFate

Name: Argo Hull
Abilities: Hull Damage: If the Primordial moves on to this tile or a Titan would be involuntarily moved onto it, roll a d10. On a 6+, the plating holds, otherwise, lose -1 @Hull and disable the Argo Support effect (only once per Battle)

Name: Fortified City
Abilities: Scouting: The first time any Titan moves on to this tile, test Cunning (6+). On Fail, flip this tile. Thermopylaed: If you push the Primordial onto this tile, test Cunning (6+). On Success, flip this tile
Flipped Abilities: Titans: If this card flipped from Scouting, gain Danger equal to the Primordial LVL and suffer Knockdown. Primordials: If this card flipped from Thermopylaed, place 1 negative AT token in the Kratos Pool

Name: Cliff
Abilities: Cannot be ignored using the {Jump} keyword. During voluntary movement, Titans may perform a Climb test to attempt to move through a Cliff tile. Small Cliff: Fury (8+). Large Cliff: Fury (10+). Success: Continue to move through the Cliff tile, ignoring the Obstacle keyword. You cannot end your movement on a Cliff tile. Fail: Your movement immediately ends

Name: Ambrosia Elephant
Treasure: 1: The bubbling ambrosia stored in the elephant enguls you! Gain 1 Ambrosia token and suffer Knockdown. 2-5: Dormant raw Ambrosia. Gain 1 Violent Ambrosia resources. 6-9: Refined Ambrosia tank. Gain 2 Violent Ambrosia resources. 10: During their excavation, the Spartans dug up a Cyclopean Burial Site. Gain a Carver Kopis @Gear card. If you already a Carver Kopis, gain a Cyclopean Visor @Gear card instead

Name: Cyclops Trap
Abilities: Setup: Place 2 Cyclops Trap Terrain tiles in the Outer 3 zone, minimum 5 spaces apart and 5 spaces from any City. Trap: If the Primordial moves through this tile, discard the tile and roll a d10: 1-6: Look at the top BP card. 7-10: Look at the top BP card. The Primordial has -1 @AT until the end of the Titan Round. If a Titan dies from the Chasm effect on this tile, discard the tile

Name: Krypteia Outpost
Abilities: Setup: Place the Krypteia Outpost in the Outer 3 Zone of one of the short Board Edges. Jamming: While the Krypteia Outpost is on the Board, you cannot use Argo Abilities. You may attack the Krypteia Outpost with a @CombatAction as if it was a Primordial. (To-Hit 4+. AT 4. Wound: You damage the structure, flip this tile and place 2 Openings in the Kratos Pool. Fail: Your attack is met with fierce opposition! These Spartans have been trained to deal with Titans. Gain +1 Danger and resolve a Trauma Draw. Critical: You destroy the structure in one fell attack! Gain +1 Progress. Discard this tile. You and one other Titan may immdiately move up to 5 spaces. Place 1 Opening token in the Kratos Pool.)
Flipped Abilities: Jamming: While the Damaged Krypteia Outpost is on the Board, you can only use 1 Argo Ability per Round. You may attack the Krypteia Outpost with a @CombatAction as if it was a Primordial. (To-Hit 6+. AT 3. Wound: Discard this tile. You and one other Titan may immediately move up to 5 spaces. Fail: Your attack is met with fierce opposition! These Spartans have been trained to deal with Titans. Gain +1 Danger and resolve a Trauma Draw. Critical: You destroy the structure in one fell attack! Gain +1 Progress. Discard this tile. You and one other Titan may immdiately move up to 5 spaces.)

Name: Graveyard Of The Frail
Abilities: %Friendly% Titans on this tile have +1 Precision. <Allied> Titans on this tile have +1 Precision and +1 @Power. If this tile is destroyed, immediately lose -1 Humanity and gain +1 @Refugees

Name: Timefront
Abilities: If a Titan would die by moving onto or beyond this Board Edge, it is erased from existence instead. Treat all Timefront Terrain tiles as a single tile

Name: Time-Frozen City
Abilities: @CombatAction Thaw Time: Once per Battle, when adjacent or on this tile, lose -1 Frozen Time and test (@ArgoFate+). On Success, you've freed the City from the Loop. Gain +1 Diplomacy with the Local Faction and replace this tile with a City Terrain tile

Name: Spot Of Nothingness
Abilities: Titans treat this tile as having {Boundless} and {Board Edge} keywords

Name: Black Iceberg
Abilities: Trap: If you push the Primordial onto this tile, remove the tile and roll a d10: 1-2: Nothing happens. 3-8: Place 1 negative @AT token in the Kratos Pool. 9-10: Place 2 negative @AT tokens in the Kratos Pool

Name: Giant Black Iceberg
Abilities: Trap: If you push the Primordial onto this tile, remove the tile and roll a d10: 1-2: Nothing happens. 3-8: Place 1 negative @AT token in the Kratos Pool. 9-10: Place 2 negative @AT tokens in the Kratos Pool

Name: Floating Rocks
Abilities: Climb test Fury (4+). On Success, yo may place your Titan on any of this tile's spaces. When on a Floating Rocks space, a Titan may move to a VP I of an adjacent Primordial with a free action. They also gain +3 to Climb tests

Name: Hyperborean Ruins
Abilities: @CombatAction *Treasure:* Once per Battle, when adjacent, search the Hyperborean Ruins. Roll a d10:<<NL>>1: You devle too deep and get lost in time and space. Suffer Time-clocked.<<NL>>2-5: Unknown dangers still lurk in the ruins. Suffer {Bleeding 1}.<<NL>>6-9: An artifact of ancient origin. Gain 1 Antediluvian Sirenshell Rare resource.<<NL>>10: Among the rubble, you find a forgotten treasure. Gain the [Exiles Garb|CJ1490] @Gear card. If you already have it, gain +1 Pygmalion Stone instead

Name: Irem City
Abilities: To climb the Irem City (if you are not on an elevated space), test Fury (5+)

Name: Irem Tower
Abilities: To climb the Irem Tower (if you are not on an elevated space), test Fury (4+)

Name: Windblighted Fleet
Abilities: %Allied% Titans on this tile have +1 @Power. %Friendly% Titans on this tile have Auto-break 1. %Denounced% When you move onto this tile, gain +1 @Danger and +1 @Fate. %At War% Treat this tile as an {Obstacle}

Name: Trireme Graveyard
Treasure: You may voluntarily choose a lower result. 1: This trireme graveyard is also a mass grave to all the lost souls on board the wrecked ships - who would have built this monument to failure? Gain 1 Despair token and 1 Ambrosia token.\2-4: The cargo holds of some of these vessels have not been emptied. Gain 5 Orichalcum Chunk resources.<<NL>>5-7: A pocket of trapped life-giving air. Flip 1 Aether token.<<NL>>8-9: An ancient cache of robbed Silver People secrets. Gain 1 Undead Silver Rare resource.<<NL>>10: These warships were part of some grand Vanguard armada, and, peculiarly, they carried a giant-sized weapon, one fit for a titan. Gain the [Hunter Killer|EJ2994] @Gear card (Secret deck 18, card 296)

Name: Wishstorm
Abilities: To climb the Wishstorm (if you are not on an elevated space), test Fury (7+)
Trap: If a Titan ends their involuntary movement on this tile, they draw an Obol. If the Primordial ends their involuntary movement on this tile, place 1 negative @AT token in the Kratos Pool
Treasure: 1: Wish Curse: The unpredictable forces of the storm rouse an ancient greed inside you. Gain the [Wishagog|DL2011] Condition card.<<NL>>2-5: Ill-Considered Wish! Gain +1 @Fate and {Wish Away 12}!<<NL>>6-9: Thoughtful Wish: Gain 1 Echo of Recollection Divine resource or gain 1 Golden Bough Rare resource.<<NL>>10: Wishbreaker Wish: Lose a Curse Affliction or gain 1 Sisyphus Tear, or gain +1 @Progress, or the [Debtguard|DJ2323] @Gear card!

Name: School of Creatures
Abilities: *Mobile:* If you start your @MovementAction on this tile, or more through it during a @MovementAction, you may move this tile up to 2 spaces in the direction of your movement. *Camouflage:* When you are on this tile, pass the @PriorityTarget Priority Target token to the next eligible holder. You cannot be a Target if there are other eligible Targets for the targeting line

Name: Black Abyss
Abilities: *Abyss:* You cannot voluntarily move through or ignore this tile in any way; you cannot measure effective range of your weapons through empty spaces of this tile. If a Black Abyss tile moves onto you or you're move involuntarily through or onto it, you are devoured (die)

Name: Staircase Entrance
Abilities: To climb the Irem Tower (if you are not on an elevated space), test Fury (4+)

Name: Arcology
Abilities: %Allied% Titans on this tile have +1 @Power. Light 1. *Omnilight:* This tile projects light in all cardinal directions. %Aligned with Nemesis% Treat this tile as an {Obstacle}
Flipped Abilities: %Allied% Titans on this tile have +1 @Power. Light 1. *Omnilight:* This tile projects light in all cardinal directions. %Aligned with Nemesis% Treat this tile as an {Obstacle}

Name: Lightwall
Abilities: *Monument to Progress:* For the purposes of Despair adjacency, treat this tile as a Titan. *Omnilight:* This tile projects light in all cardinal directions
